title: Scheduled Minor Patch - January 11, 2024
content: We will be performing a scheduled minor patch on Thursday, January 11, 2024 at 7:00 AM PST (10:00 AM EST / 4:00 PM CET / 2:00 AM AEDT Jan. 12).

title: Cash Shop Update for January 10
content: Reboot Petite Luna Pets, Luna Crystal, Royal Styles, Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry, and more!

title: More Identisk Events to Enjoy!
content: It's time for the Identisk Festival Celebration! Head over to Identisk to check out the final additions to the island!

title: Explore Carcion, the Cradle of Life!
content: Protect the new area, Carcion, from Darmoorâ€™s apostle who seeks the power of the ancient god, Keira.

title: Miracle Winter - January 13 - Shoes
content: On Saturday, January 13, 2024, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Shoe Equipment!

title: [Completed] Unscheduled Channel Maintenance - January 3, 2024
content: The unscheduled channel maintenance has been completed. Thank you for your patience.
